CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
CurrentVersion.description: The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: Behaviors
CurrentVersion.description: A new data type in Microsoft 365 Defender Advanced Hunting. Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.

Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Headlines report in Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Insights analysts and leaders are interested in finding highlights and opportunities in their Copilot adoption data, but it can be time-consuming to find the groups that are experiencing dramatic trends or have much higher or lower Copilot usage than expected. Copilot Headlines shows an analyst where interesting things are happening in their data by automatically scanning a query and looking for outliers, changes over time, and differences from dynamic internal benchmarks. Analysts receive the headlines in a Power BI report as a table, along with supporting visualizations to help explore and validate the results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dynamic internal benchmarks for Advanced Insights
OldVersion.description: Collaboration norms vary by roles and geographies, and comparing behavioral metrics across groups can draw misleading conclusions if those groups are comprised of different roles. Dynamic internal benchmarks allow the analyst to understand the expected behaviors of a group based on similar employees within the company.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: External benchmarks in Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: External benchmarks provide Insights analysts with helpful reference points to illustrate what "normal" looks like across other companies with similar size or industry profiles, to help users interpret their company's own Insights results. External benchmarks will be available to analyst users in Advanced Insights as a new page in the Copilot Headlines Power BI report.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introduction to metrics and benchmarks in Advanced Insights
OldVersion.description: This report template for analysts in Advanced Insights provides an introduction to some of the most frequently used Viva Insights metrics, grounding both new and veteran analysts in their definitions, applications, and how their group's results compare to typical ranges using both internal and external benchmarks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
OldVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
CurrentVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the transcription experience in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We’re making improvements to enhance the transcription experience in meetings. First, when transcription, recording, or Copilot are enabled before or during the meeting, users will be prompted to select the spoken language to ensure transcription accuracy. Second, when transcription is enabled (whether by itself or when recording or Copilot are enabled) only the meeting organizer, co-organizers, and transcript initiator will be able to change the spoken language. Next, we’re simplifying the settings by creating a new settings page for meeting spoken language and translation language for live translated captions at Caption settings > Language settings > Meeting spoken language and transcript found at Transcript > Language settings > Meeting spoken language.  Lastly, when participants speak a language that doesn’t match the selected language in the spoken language setting, the meeting organizer, co-organizer and initiator will get a notification that the language is mismatched.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the transcription experience in meetings
OldVersion.description: We’re making improvements to enhance the transcription experience in meetings. First, when transcription, recording, or Copilot are enabled before or during the meeting, users will be prompted to select the spoken language to ensure transcription accuracy. Second, when transcription is enabled (whether by itself or when recording or Copilot are enabled) only the meeting organizer, co-organizers, and transcript initiator will be able to change the spoken language. Next, we’re simplifying the settings by creating a new settings page for meeting spoken language and translation language for live translated captions at Caption settings > Language settings > Meeting spoken language and transcript found at Transcript > Language settings > Meeting spoken language.  Lastly, when participants speak a language that doesn’t match the selected language in the spoken language setting, the meeting organizer, co-organizer and initiator will get a notification that the language is mismatched.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Export Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. 
Key changes with export enhancements:
The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for Ediscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages.
Additionally, for Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. 
Other changes coming through are:
- Change in Export limits and ZIP folder partitioning
- Better Export settings with more options
- New reporting capabilities
- Enhancements in Results load file

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS

Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: Behaviors
CurrentVersion.description: A new data type in Microsoft 365 Defender Advanced Hunting. Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Verified Answers
CurrentVersion.description: Certain users like experts and admins will be able to mark answers to questions as verified answers to signal a credible and accurate answer. Questions with verified answers will receive its own special verified label and badge at the top of the question and on the verified answer. The goal of verified answers is to help enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Headlines report in Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Insights analysts and leaders are interested in finding highlights and opportunities in their Copilot adoption data, but it can be time-consuming to find the groups that are experiencing dramatic trends or have much higher or lower Copilot usage than expected. Copilot Headlines shows an analyst where interesting things are happening in their data by automatically scanning a query and looking for outliers, changes over time, and differences from dynamic internal benchmarks. Analysts receive the headlines in a Power BI report as a table, along with supporting visualizations to help explore and validate the results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: External benchmarks in Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: External benchmarks provide Insights analysts with helpful reference points to illustrate what "normal" looks like across other companies with similar size or industry profiles, to help users interpret their company's own Insights results. External benchmarks will be available to analyst users in Advanced Insights as a new page in the Copilot Headlines Power BI report.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva-Glint - Self service for custom access data user export
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows Glint admins to export the access rules defined for survey programs, administration, and focus areas that has been customized for users in the platform.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Search Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to search meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
CurrentVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

CurrentVersion.title: Sharepoint: Sharepoint Agents
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users can create an agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for web and in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Bringing the power of Microsoft Copilot to OneNote for web and in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
CurrentVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging new web pages. It can utilize built-in templates or custom templates from your organization, along with existing documents as grounding data, to generate high-quality page content. All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description:
Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate custom questions with standard Viva Glint questions to utilize benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. 

This feature allows survey creators to tailor standard questions to better fit their needs while still benefiting from benchmark data. 

For example, the standard question might be: 
"How happy are you working at {{company name}}?" 

You can create and map multiple similar questions to this standard question, such as: 
- "How happy are you working at {{company name}} this quarter?" 
- "How happy are you working at {{company name}} this year?" 

By doing so, you can leverage benchmark comparisons for custom questions, ensuring you get the most relevant insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP support for Fabric Lakehouse
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy support for Fabric will allow admins to further scope DLP policies to lakehouses  in addition to Power BI (which is supported today). Now in Fabric lakehouses, DLP policies can help audit and notify users through Policy Tips based upon sensitive content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Rewrite by Copilot in Edge is being upgraded to include enterprise data protection compliance standards
CurrentVersion.description:
Rewrite by Copilot in Edge, which lets users edit typed text for tone, format, and length within an open page in Microsoft Edge, is being updated to include enterprise data protection for commercial customers. Once Rewrite is available, users signed in with a Microsoft Entra ID will have enterprise data protection when using the feature in Microsoft Edge.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/edge

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
CurrentVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time graph in Amplify reporting
CurrentVersion.description: This release will add a dwell time graph to Amplify reporting. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. This graph will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (iPhone)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Ensure via optional IT admin policy that new shared Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
CurrentVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - MIP auto-labeling for Azure SQL & Storage
CurrentVersion.description: Extend your sensitivity labels to specific or all subscriptions within Azure Storage and Azure SQL Server via auto-labeling policy. Clearly define labeling conditions for data sources beyond M365 without fear of it interfering with existing M365 files configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Feature usage data sync
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Sync, which enables users to synchronize their Edge user data across multiple devices, is now launching a new sync data category called Feature Usage. This new category will allow users to synchronize data regarding their utilization of Edge features across all their devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
CurrentVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Downgrade/remove sensitivity label
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature is an enhancement to the existing IRM Office Indicator - Downgrading sensitivity labels applied to SharePoint files and removing sensitivity labels from SharePoint files.

In the current version, only sensitivity label changes on SharePoint Web app are captured in IRM. But with the latest update, this indicator captures the sensitivity label changes (downgrade/remove) when performed on OneDrive, AIP, and Endpoint (SharePoint file opened in Office app or any sensitivity label change on the local files on your device).

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
CurrentVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections on the SharePoint app bar
CurrentVersion.description: The Connections in the SharePoint App bar feature will provide a seamless entry point to Viva Connections from SharePoint, enhancing the synergy between the Intranet and Viva Connections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Template creation in Commercial
CurrentVersion.description: Users can create their own Clipchamp templates for personal use or distribution across an organization via brand kits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve introduced a new "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This update provides more flexibility and customization in categorizing your emails and calendar events. By selecting the "None" option, users can now choose to have items without a designated color, allowing for cleaner organization and more control over which items stand out visually. Updated February 6, 2025: This item was changed to "Launched" by mistake. The correct status is currently "Rolling out." #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat – File Sensitivity Labels in Copilot web grounding chat
CurrentVersion.description: After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Copilot web grounding chat responses will now show content sensitivity labels for prompts in which a user has attached or uploaded a Microsoft 365 file like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in Business Chat web mode and Microsoft Copilot chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tag Mentions filter in Activity
CurrentVersion.description: To view all your tag mentions, select the tag mentions filter in your activity feed. The ‘@Mentions’ filter allows you to catch up quickly on personal mentions, while the ‘Tag mentions’ filter helps you catch up on the Tag mentions you are part of.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the transcription experience in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We’re making improvements to enhance the transcription experience in meetings. First, when transcription, recording, or Copilot are enabled before or during the meeting, users will be prompted to select the spoken language to ensure transcription accuracy. Second, when transcription is enabled (whether by itself or when recording or Copilot are enabled) only the meeting organizer, co-organizers, and transcript initiator will be able to change the spoken language. Next, we’re simplifying the settings by creating a new settings page for meeting spoken language and translation language for live translated captions at Caption settings > Language settings > Meeting spoken language and transcript found at Transcript > Language settings > Meeting spoken language.  Lastly, when participants speak a language that doesn’t match the selected language in the spoken language setting, the meeting organizer, co-organizer and initiator will get a notification that the language is mismatched.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
CurrentVersion.description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
CurrentVersion.description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Enhancements to Copilot admin page
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot page in the Microsoft 365 admin center is the dedicated place for tools, insights, and resources for Copilot administration. The Copilot page will be updated with enhancements to the Overview section and we will be introducing a new Health section. The Overview section will be updated to include key success metrics and insights such as the active user rate, AI assistance score, Copilot assisted hours, and user sentiment.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared with Me Settings page
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will be merged with feature (375635)

This creates a new settings page that will give users details on the permissions they have for the Shared folders and mailboxes that they have added to the new Outlook for Windows and OWA. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Preview for Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: This creates Preview mode for authors to view how their Pages and News will look across different device types while editing.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move email between mailbox and PST file in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able move (drag and drop) emails from a .pst file to a mailbox and vice versa. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Manage email in PST files in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to move, copy, delete, flag/unflag, mark as read/unread, and set categories for email within .pst files. Additionally, users will be able to create, delete, move, and rename folders within .pst files. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can now reference files to help generate drafts
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a form with Copilot, users can now reference existing documents such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Users can also reference an existing form by pasting the form's URL into the prompt box. Additionally, Copilot can search and suggest relevant files when generating a form, so users can easily create a draft that meets their needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms has been refreshed to help users better refine and edit their forms
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms has been revamped to more easily help users refine and modify their forms. Users can now type prompts to Copilot to help with editing and refinement, so they can get tailored suggestions and easily get their forms ready to send.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
CurrentVersion.description: Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
CurrentVersion.description: Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Adding and editing external contacts
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, users will now be able to add and edit external contacts from Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Add CVI Coordinates to Townhall and webinar invites
CurrentVersion.description: With CVI coordinates in invites, now non-Teams users—such as external customers or partners—can easily join Teams Townhall and webinar meetings using a third-party teleconferencing device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to separate out the Townhall attendee invites
CurrentVersion.description: This backend change will now address the 'separation of attendee' invites from the events crew. This feature allows the organizers of Townhalls to maintain separate invites for attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall Attendee/Presenter email dial in details.
CurrentVersion.description: With the release of this feature, the Townhall attendee and presenter invites will have dial in details available in the body of the email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Townhall presenters will now have the ability to join their townhalls using dial-in details. These details will be available in the body of the invite email they receive from Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Labeling improvement for non-Office/PDF files using endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: This allows the customer to use a label for a non-Office/PDF file without productivity impact.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry can ground their agent in files stored in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant Graph grounding provides grounding for agents with relevant information from Microsoft Graph, including files stored in SharePoint. This capability is now available to developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Pronoun Awareness in Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot will soon use pronouns from user profiles when responding, creating a more personalized interaction for users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat prompt input box
CurrentVersion.description: This update aligns Copilot Chat prompt input box across chat experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Support for inline videos and GIFs in articles
CurrentVersion.description: This adds support for inline videos and GIFs in Viva Engage articles.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Export Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. 
Key changes with export enhancements:
The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for Ediscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages.
Additionally, for Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. 
Other changes coming through are:
- Change in Export limits and ZIP folder partitioning
- Better Export settings with more options
- New reporting capabilities
- Enhancements in Results load file

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Editing and viewing community 'info' revamped
CurrentVersion.description: Revamp the community "info" experience to be in line with the existing Engage user patterns. Editing the info, will now be available within the settings experience. Users can read the info from the "About" section additionally.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Central community membership approval experience revamped
CurrentVersion.description: The centralized community membership approval experience undergoes a revamp to make it easier for community admins to manage approval requests for all communities they administer, in ONE single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - 'AI & Copilot Resources' provider availability to all Viva Learning users
CurrentVersion.description: The 'AI & Copilot Resources' provider will be enabled by default for all Viva Learning users. Administrators will have the ability to manage the visibility of this provider within Viva Learning

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Group messages as conversation for PST files in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Create channels with ease
CurrentVersion.description: Efficiently create channels directly from the header menu, eliminating the need to scroll down to the specific team. As a channel creator, you will have the flexibility to choose from all the teams you can create a channel in to host your new channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Semantic search support for in-app Searches
CurrentVersion.description: Semantic search capability understands context and nuances of user queries, providing more accurate and relevant results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy reports in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Usage reporting for Copilot Academy will be available in Viva Insights via the Analyst Workbench. Users can access these reports through Excel or a PowerBI dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva Learning surfaces personalized according to User skills
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning surfaces will be personalized based on user-selected skills and inferred skills derived from their role and activity within the Microsoft Graph. This ensures that the learning content is tailored to each user's unique needs and professional context.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - SharePoint results integration in Viva Learning Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to discover relevant internal SharePoint content seamlessly while searching within Viva Learning, ensuring they have access to all pertinent resources in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to export policy settings
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Upcoming change to shared folder experience in Microsoft OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature update, when a user clicks a link to a shared folder from Teams chat, channels, email, or other places, they will navigate to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This new view, organized by people, will show and allow access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications on web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen when using Teams on web. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Experience insights for Microsoft 365 admins
CurrentVersion.description: The Experience insights in the Microsoft 365 admin center offers admins consistent data across usage, feedback, Net Promoter Score, and Help articles consumption. Admins can use such data to increase user satisfaction by launching relevant trainings and awareness campaigns in the organization. This experience would be particularly valuable to those roles in the IT organization who are responsible for understanding and improving the user experience for Microsoft 365. Note: We apologize for stating that this has rolled out, when in fact it will not until December 2023. Note: This item is no longer accurate and will be removed from the roadmap.
